summary: A fantasy love story that drifts between this world and heaven. Chasuke (Ken'ichi Matsuyama) is in charge of making tea in heaven. He has feelings for a human woman named Yuri (Ito Ohno) ... See full summary »
cast: Ken'ichi Matsuyama|Ito Ono|Ren Osugi|Yûsuke Iseya|Hiromasa Taguchi|Tina Tamashiro|Susumu Terajima|Hiroki Konno|Takashi Matsuyuki|Ryo|Yasunari Takeshima|Shintarô Yamada
title: Ten no Chasuke
